title: remove SSLTestConfig deprecations
description: remove methods & constants deprecated in SOLR-8970, as well the solrtest.keystore file which is no longer needed now that these methods/constants are removed (since 6.0.1 solr tests have used a keystore loaded from test-framework's jar - the file was only left in place for backcompat if anyone downstream was using the deprecated methods & constnats)
